Gold Powered By Track your dues and bills like never before. We bring punctuality in your life Next Your payment checklist sorted Payment = Rewards Register all the details here and we make sure you don’t miss out on any payments. We don’t just ask for money. Claim amazing rewards by being a punctual customer Proceed Proceed to Pay Welcome to Paul Gold,\n we are happy to serve you!! Please enter your phone number +91 Please fill the OTP sent to the given number CHANGE? Give us some moment to verify few things. Much appreciated. VERIFY Verifying Verified
Please create an account before we proceed. Full Name Email ID Set Up a M-Pin By creating the account, I accept to the Terms and Conditions. Sign Up Continue with google Already have an account? Log In This may take up sometime, but please bear with us! Sign up via google successful! We believe in security.We believe in security Please create a M-pin for you Confirm new M-Pin Confirm M-Pin Confirm And we are finally done, welcome home user. We are glad to have you with us. BILLS & MORE GOLD LOAN HOME LOCATE US MENU Search for “Loans” (Be a loyal payer and keep no dues) DTH SERVICES ELECTRICITY BROADBAND MOBILE MOBILE RECHARGE MOBILE POSTPAID Home sweet Home bills CABLE TV LANDLINE WATER HOME RENT GAS PIPELINE APARTMENT GAS CYLINDER EDUCATION Financial Security INSURANCE MUNICIPAL TAX Transit Window FASTag CHALLAN METRO CARD BACK Notifications Profile Search Search for “Bills“ Search for “Credit Card” Search for “upcoming dues” OTT World YOUR CARDS (You wont lose them from here) PREPAID CARD View View LOAN OVERVIEW OverView: Search for the specific loans You have taken up 4 active loans. And they total upto INR 3,00,000 Open Loans Closed Loans VIEW DETAILS LOAN CLOSED Services Transactions Settings Loans Renewal Recharges Other Bills Other EMI’s Others EMI payments Others Credit Score CREDIT SCORE (One place for everything) *Pay bills and more to win \nPaul Points and get exciting offers.
